DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare effect dietary fat , ingest two physical form , acute energy balance , appetitive , glycemic response healthy normal ( BMI 18-24.9 kgm-2 ) overweight ( BMI > 25kgm-2 ) adult .
DOC.detailed_description: This randomise , crossover study . Randomisation perform online randomisation software ( www.randomizer.org ) . Participants screen ( 1 screen visit ) attend five test visit conduct whole room calorimeter ( WRC ) . During test visit , participant arrive laboratory overnight fast , enter WRC rest 15 minute supine position , rest energy expenditure ( REE ) measure 30 minute consume congee juice alone ( control ) , one 4 dietary fat : sunflower oil ( SO ) gel ( SG ) coconut oil ( CO ) gel ( CG ) ( total 5 test visit ) . Post-meal energy expenditure , fat oxidation , glycemia appetite ( visual analog scale ) measure continuously 3 hour WRC , follow meal challenge participant eat sate . Participants return repeat protocol fat type form complete .
DOC.criteria: People major chronic disease heart disease , cancer , hypertension diabetes mellitus People know food allergy , due potential trace allergens find commercially available food product use study ( Knorr 's instant congee ) People claustrophobic Individuals take insulin drug know affect glucose metabolism , appetite , body fat distribution Have weight change > 5kg past 3 month People major medical surgical event require hospitalization within precede three month People weight loss regime Individuals presence disease drug influence digestion absorption nutrient
